email_body: I'll send 2 invites up. What's your location? Gregory Carraway@ENRON 07/10/2000 02:36 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Thank you for the invitation. I would love to attend. I would like to invite my wife, if that would be ok. Also, could you tell me where the Mercantile bar is located? Thank you!!!
